function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for increased exposure to contagious diseases due to longitudinal studies and data collection during and after the pandemic.","Impact":"Risk of spreading contagious diseases among researchers and participants.","Mitigation":"Implement strict health and safety protocols for researchers and participants, including regular testing and vaccination.","Technologies":"Health monitoring technology for researchers and participants, virtual research methods.","People":"Researchers, participants, and the general public.","Owner":"Research institutions, government health agencies."},{"Description":"Natural experiments may expose different groups of people to varying conditions, potentially leading to increased spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Potential for unequal exposure to contagious diseases among different population groups.","Mitigation":"Ensure equitable access to healthcare and preventive measures for all population groups involved in the natural experiments.","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mobile health clinics, healthcare outreach programs.","People":"Different population groups involved in natural experiments, particularly vulnerable populations.","Owner":"Public health authorities, local healthcare organizations."},{"Description":"Collaboration and convergence research may involve increased interaction and collaboration between different research groups, leading to potential transmission of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Risk of cross-contamination and spread of contagious diseases among research groups.","Mitigation":"Enforce strict hygiene practices, maintain physical distancing, and utilize virtual collaboration tools.","Technologies":"Virtual collaboration platforms, remote research tools, sanitation and hygiene technology.","People":"Researchers from different disciplines and research groups.","Owner":"Research institutions, collaborating organizations."}]}
